ai.summary: A gentle 3.9 km circular hike around Cushendun Village in the UK. The route offers coastal scenery, village views, and an easy, family-friendly path suitable for most walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a mix of paved paths, compact gravel, and grassy sections. Expect some uneven ground near the shoreline and possible mud in wet conditions. The route is well signposted and largely on level paths.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly—check forecasts before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of wet, slippery surfaces, and watch for exposed coastal areas and tides. Supervise children near the shoreline. Carry water, a small first aid kit, and a charged mobile phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Light rain jacket and extra layer
Map or offline navigation / fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with ideal conditions in spring and summer due to milder weather and longer daylight; autumn can also be pleasant. Winter may be windy and muddy.

seo.title: Cushendun Village Circular Trail – 3.9 km Easy Hike in Cushendun, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Cushendun Village Circular Trail, a 3.9 km easy coastal hike in Cushendun, UK. Family-friendly route with village and sea views; tips, gear, and safety.
seo.h1: Cushendun Village Circular Trail – Cushendun, UK (3.9 km, Easy)
